name: World Leadership Alliance-Club de Madrid
headAddress: Palacio del Marqués de Cañete, Mayor Street, 69, Level 1
goal: World Leadership Alliance-Club de Madrid is a global network of democratic former Presidents and Prime ministers with a concrete mission: free from the constraints of office, and on a pro bono basis, our members offer today’s leaders their independent and non-partisan voices, experience and convening power, for supporting good governance and fostering a democracy that delivers results for everybody. World Leadership Alliance-Club de Madrid works with several experts and like minded institutions who, as project partners, provide specific advice on a wide range of issues. Through third party collaborations we also promote the mission and initiatives of other organizations in support of shared goals.
interests: Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: European Instrument for Democracy & Human Rights (EIDHR); European Citizens' Initiative (ECI); European Neighbourhood Instrument (ENI); European Development Fund (EDF); Development Cooperation Instrument (DCI); Stability and Peace (IcSP); European Endowment for Democracy (EED); Digital Agenda for Europe; PROTECT (“Preventing Violent Extremism Through Promoting Tolerance and Respect for Diversity"); and EU Migration Policy.
